item.description:
Saturday May 18 we’ll explore  East/Central Cambridge Open Studios tour for us from 1-3PM.

Meet at 1PM inside Gallery 263 Art Studios at 263 Pearl St Cambridge MA

We’ll explore Art in the Central Square and, Mid Cambridge  Areas.

Explore Cambridge's diverse collection of public art and experience the myriad of styles and genres that the artists in Cambridge have to offer as you get an inside look at artists' studios, writers' workshops, theater prop rooms, and much more!

OK here is the Art Tour order we’ll start at #1 also we can stop at other art studios along the way but I want to be sure we see these 5 and we’ll be doing a lot of walking so wear comfortable walking shoes.

1. 263 Pearl Street Gallery 263 for Mixed Media|Photography|Painting at   

2. 128 Pearl Street David W. Torrey for Painting|Sculpture|cryptoarchaeology at

3.  20 Kelly Road Paul Gray for Assemblage at

4.  438 Massachusetts Avenue Tim Tsang Music|Performance Art  + Toni Bee Cambridge Poet Populist  for Music|Poetry at CCTV 

5. Corner of Massachusetts Avenue and Albany Street (by river and MIT) Community Art Center  for Mixed Media|Painting|Drawing / Community Mural & Outdoor Gallery:  

Thanks + keep having fun enjoy life. Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: We’ll meet and start at Gallery 263 Art Studios at 263 Pearl St Cambridge MA
item.name: Explore East/Central Cambridge Open Art Studios Tour
